snippet: The comments by the United Nations human rights chief promoted the Syrian envoy to refer to her actions as “lunatic.”
abstract: Navi Pillay, United Nations high commissioner for human rights, says that abuses by Syrian government far outweigh atrocities committed by opposition forces; comments are likely to fortify French efforts to push Security Council to refer Syria to International Criminal Court.
lead_paragraph: The comments by the United Nations human rights chief promoted the Syrian envoy to refer to her actions as “lunatic.”

headline.main: Government’s Abuses ‘Far Outweigh’ Syrian Rebels’, Rights Chief Says
headline.print_headline: Government’s Abuses ‘Far Outweigh’ Syrian Rebels’, Rights Chief Says
